name: Hampton Inn 35th St. Empire State Building

reviews.text: Thank you for yet another enjoyable stay at the Hampton Inn. I arrived at around 11.00 prepared to drop of my bag prior to hitting the streets of NYC, but the very nice girl on reception said if I would like to wait 10 minutes my room would be ready, and it was. Great, comfortable rooms with ample space. The room was spotlessly clean and the beds are very comfortable after all the walking entailed in a day in New York. I love the location of this hotel - just across the road from Macy's and close to the subway and good bars and restaurants. The breakfast also really sets you up for the day!
reviews.title: Super, yet again ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed near Times Square once before at a terrible dirty hotel so decided to go with a big chain this time for some more quality assurance. I was relieved to find this place as a clean Manhattan hotel. While $200 is more than I'm used to spending for 1 night, the location was really worth it and this hotel was the cheapest I could find while feeling confident the rooms would be OK. Walked to/from Penn Station, Broadway theatre, great restaurants, and Times Square (none of the walks were over 20 minutes). The room was small with a nice bathroom. Breakfast buffet included in price was a bonus. A typical standard hotel room.
reviews.title: Comfortable, Clean, Small Room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cons: The curtains didn't close all the way so the light woke me up early in the morning. Also, the breakfast wasn't well-run. Most items were empty/missing for most of the time I was there, trying to jump up to get what I wanted when it was finally refilled before everyone else.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended!

reviews.text: If you need a base from which to explore NYC, then this hotel is perfect. It's ideally located minutes away from the 'fashion district' if shopping is your thing, and there are also two subway stations close by that allow you to connect to the main lines heading downtown (Soho, Greenwich, etc) and uptown (towards Central Park). It's also walking distance from Madison Square Gardens and Times Square.
reviews.title: Always coming to Hampton inns when in new York

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are stylish, spacious, comfortable and very well equipped - the beds are huge. Although its located in a busy part of town, it's not overly noisy and we got an excellent nights sleep. The staff are friendly and helpful and provide luggage storage if you want to squeeze in a little more exploration of the city before you head back to the airport on your last day.
reviews.title: Hampton's - always good as usual

reviews.text: I stayed with my daughter for her 21st birthday. We had a great time, the staff were helpful, the room was satisfactory but small. the worst feature was the heating/air conditioning which was very noisy and the room went cold very quickly. when the heating came on it was a very loud fan that woke us up and blew the curtains excessively.
reviews.title: A good hotel for the price in a great location

reviews.text: The breakfast was good - but there was always a crowd around the toaster and the waffle iron and pastries.
reviews.title: Clean, quiet stay

reviews.text: Stayed at this Hampton Inn for the first time in October 2010 for a business trip with colleagues. It's located right next door to a Hilton Garden Inn and is close to walk to many sites. Clean room, quiet stay. The room was small, but that's to expected in NYC. The usual Hampton Inn free breakfast available in the morning. Starbucks is just up the block to the corner. It was a pleasant stay and I'd book this property again for either business or leisure.
reviews.title: Grate location, grate staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel in July 2009 for four nights.
reviews.title: Good hotel in a great location

reviews.text: Grate location 5 min from the Emire State Building.
reviews.title: Far from being bad, but not good

reviews.text: I stayed on in New York for a few days after a work trip, and the Hampton was perfect for me. It was one of the cheaper places in Manhatten, and being close to times square, 5th avenue etc, the location and price were great. Breakfast was basic, but more than good enough for me. The rooms were clean, comfortable, and very quiet. It's a big thumbs-up from me!
reviews.title: Reccomended!

reviews.text: Clean, nice rooms, friendly and helpful staff. Nice view over Empire state building. Location is excellent for tourists. Really enjoyed my three-night-stay in January. Much better than the other hotels in the same price-range I have stayed at in NY. Thanks!
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a typical Hampton on a small NYC lot . 20 some stories. By the time you factor in space for 2 elevators and 2 staircases there is only room for 10 small rooms per floor. .
reviews.title: Staff needs to commit to getting guest rooms serviced.

reviews.text: We checked in without hassle and all was fine till the next day - we left at 10 AM (after strightening up our stuff and leaving a tip on the dresser) - and returned at 3:45 to find - well - nothing had been done - the towels still on the floor, bed unmade, tip stil there.
reviews.title: Decent rooms, but terrible breakfast and a bit over crowded

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So we called the desk, there were e few calls back and forth. Housekeeping was behind, "because they had groups in" and the shift was leaving at 4:30. Our evening plans were complicated so we eventually told them to just drop off a set of towels.
reviews.title: Good location but disappointing experience overall

reviews.text: I booked this stay having amassed a number of Hilton Honors points. I was surprised how close the hotel is to Macy's and the convenient subway connections (at 34th Street, Herald Square).
reviews.title: Great location, friendly staff and superb value

reviews.text: I was also impressed by the quality of the complimentary breakfast. The room size was not the biggest I've stayed in, but it was sufficient for one or two people. The LCD widescreen TV with ample numbers of channels was also good. Bathroom was clean and had a bath rather than a shower (which I liked). In the basement there is a free business lounge to access the internet.
reviews.title: It was a very comfortable stay in the heart of the city with all the leisure.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is no room service. However there is a list in each room of restuarants that deliver, with detailed menus.
reviews.title: best price/value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I also liked the 24 hour free access to coffee and tea in the ground floor restaurant which was a nice bonus. The staff were friendly, helpful and very welcoming. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to visit NYC.
reviews.title: Great location and easy to get to

reviews.text: We came to US from India as our one of the two sons is California in US., We flew to New York to visit Niagara but at the same time wanted to see New York city without undergoing hassles of driving. This hotel served our purpose and we did not have to make any compromises of peace in spite of being in the heart of the city. It is at a very convenient location with plenty of choices restaurants.
reviews.title: Central but prob could do better

aka: Hampton Inn 35th St. Empire State Building Hotel New York City
description: Newly built hotel that opened it's doors just four short years ago. Although the hotel is new, we just completed a FULL lobby & fitness center renovation. We have added a new lighting package to our guest rooms as well as new accent wall vinyl and custom vanity shelving to our bathrooms. Our hotel features Compliementary HOT breakfast buffet each morning as well as Complimentary wireless internet service. Our team is at your service and awaiting your arrival.
